prompt: Clean horizontal flowchart on pure black background with 4 steps: 1) document/checklist icon 2) gear/cog icon 3) bell notification icon 4) checkmark in circle icon. Each icon is white, simple flat vector style. Orange arrows pointing right between each step. Numbers 1-2-3-4 below each icon in small orange text. Corporate infographic style, no artistic effects, clean like a pitch deck diagram.
